ygData.subject: Re: Blind as a bat
ygData.msgSnippet: My only way out is a guise of the deceiver I heard that gives you ultravision.
ygData.messageBody:
My only way out is a guise of the deceiver I heard that gives you ultravision.

At 03:45 PM 10/27/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Trinak Veeshan <trinakeq@...>
>
>Your blind almost forever. Shiverback gloves are
>pretty good. They give Serpent Sight, and from what i
>can tell, Ultravision is only slightly better, but ya
>gotta wait till your 46+ for Plane of Fear.
>
>Enjoy.
>
>--- Andrew Beall <abeall@...> wrote:
>> I started a monk last weekend. After growing bored
>> of my high lvl druid. My
>> one question is How do you see? I get nervous going
>> anywhere at night. I
>> have Wu's fighting guantlets...but Greater
>> lightstones are not the answer
>> and heat/cold stones are no rent is there anything
>> out there that is good
>> to use to see. Or am I blind forever? =(
>>
>>
><HR>
>
>>
>
>
>=====
>
>>
